display_long_description:
🏆 Mixed Reality App of the Year 🏆 - UploadVR 2024

# Create, Collect, & Play: The Ultimate Mixed Reality Experience!

Figmin XR is a fun spatial computing application that lets you easily create, collect & play in mixed reality. With an intuitive interface and multiplayer, anything you imagine can come to life!

Decorate your room with stunning 3D models, create physics games and immersive educational experiences, produce awesome videos for social media or develop compelling marketing content, dive into storytelling, art, and visualization projects, or make anything you can imagine.  

**Built-In Tools:**

🎨 3D Sketching: Powered by Tilt Brush!

🌐 Web Browser Integration: Extract images and models to view in 3D space and create web apps.

🎥 Search and Import: Add 3D models, animated GIFs, and videos to your projects

✍️ 3D Text Editor: Design and display text in your virtual world

🤖 Full scripting support: Learn more www.figmin.com/api

🎮 Physics Editor: Bring your creations to life with real-world physics.

🎥 Motion Editor: Animate objects simply by moving them around

💡 Lighting Editor: Illuminate the real world with advanced lighting controls.

🌟 Voxel Editor & Voxelizer: Create and transform 2D and 3D models into editable voxels

🌍 Content Discovery: Explore Figmin XR’s user-generated content and publish your own.

🖌️ Stylus Support: Logitech MXInk Stylus compatibility for precision editing.

**Supported Formats for Web Content Extraction:**
- Images: PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP
- 3D Models: GLB (GLTF binary)
